name: Stick figure fight
description:
The beautiful matchmaker world is pregnant with many creatures. Suddenly, a group of extraterrestrial visitors came down one day. The Demon King not only killed people cruelly, but also released evil energy everywhere. His companions were blackened by the Demon King. The Demon King performed terrible magic and copied and evolved his companions. In order to protect the homeland and restore the former glory of the homeland, players must defeat them.

Fire This is a match man real-time combat game. The pictures in the game are very exquisite. Players will defeat other match men and get higher scores through their flexible operations.

Game features

1. Use your operation to defeat the match people who are constantly refreshing.

2. It will take you to experience the most exciting battle journey, and you need to stick to it longer.



Game play

↑=Raise weapon

Space=Jump

←=Move left

→=Move right

Game advantages

1. Keep practicing your operation, speed up your understanding of the game, challenge your limits, and get higher scores.

2. The operation mode of the game is very simple. You can try to create a combo.

3. You will become a brave man to save the world and defeat the enemies who have been refreshed.
